languages.text: "Я признательна леди Зауэрбэк за эту честь. Умирать в постели не хочется — куда славнее пасть в бою, защищая Лорд-капитана и давя предателей". {n}Старушка очень артистично кивает невпопад и промокает платочком глаза.{/n}

"I am grateful to Mistress Sauerback for the honour. I don't want to die in my bed. Let me fall in battle, defending the Lord Captain and crushing traitors." {n}Belinda gives an imperious yet absent-minded nod and dabs her eyes with the handkercher.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я признательна леди Зауэрбэк за эту честь. Умирать в постели не хочется — куда славнее пасть в бою, защищая Лорд-капитана и давя предателей". {n}Старушка очень артистично кивает невпопад и промокает платочком глаза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I am grateful to Lady Sauerback for the honour. I would rather not die in bed but fall in battle, defending the Lord Captain and crushing traitors." {n}Belinda nods absent-mindedly in a pointed way and dabs her eyes with the handkerchief.{/n}

"I am grateful to Lady Sauerback for the honour. I would rather not die in bed but fall in battle, defending the Lord Captain and crushing traitors." {n}Belinda nods absent-mindedly in a pointed way and dabs her eyes with the handkerchief.{/n}

"I am grateful to Lady Sauerback for the honour. I have no desire to die in my bed. Let me fall in battle, defending the Lord Captain and crushing traitors." {n}Belinda gives an imperious yet absent-minded nod and dabs her eyes with the handkerchief.{/n}

"I am grateful to Lady Sauerback for the honour. I have no desire to die in my bed. Let me fall in battle, defending the Lord Captain and crushing traitors." {n}Belinda gives an imperious yet absent-minded nod and dabs her eyes with the handkerchief.{/n}

"I am grateful to Mistress Sauerback for the honour. I don't want to die in my bed. Let me fall in battle, defending the Lord Captain and crushing traitors." {n}Belinda gives an imperious yet absent-minded nod and dabs her eyes with the handkercher.{/n}

"I am grateful to Mistress Sauerback for the honour. I don't want to die in my bed. Let me fall in battle, defending the Lord Captain and crushing traitors." {n}Belinda gives an imperious yet absent-minded nod and dabs her eyes with the handkercher.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich bin Herrin Sauerback dankbar für die Ehre. Ich will nicht im Bett sterben. Lasst mich im Kampf untergehen, wenn ich den Lord Captain verteidige und Verräter zerschmettere." {n}Belinda nickt bestimmend, aber abwesend, und tupft sich mit dem Taschentuch die Augen ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am grateful to Mistress Sauerback for the honour. I don't want to die in my bed. Let me fall in battle, defending the Lord Captain and crushing traitors." {n}Belinda gives an imperious yet absent-minded nod and dabs her eyes with the handkercher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin Herrin Sauerback dankbar für die Ehre. Ich will nicht im Bett sterben. Lasst mich im Kampf untergehen, wenn ich den Lord Captain verteidige und Verräter zerschmettere." {n}Belinda nickt bestimmend, aber abwesend, und tupft sich mit dem Taschentuch die Augen ab.{/n}

languages.text: «Estoy agradecida a la maestra Sauerback por este honor. No deseo morir en mi lecho. Prefiero caer en combate, defendiendo {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán y matando traidores». {n}Belinda asiente distraídamente pero con firmeza y se enjuga las lágrimas de los ojos con el pañuelo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am grateful to Mistress Sauerback for the honour. I don't want to die in my bed. Let me fall in battle, defending the Lord Captain and crushing traitors." {n}Belinda gives an imperious yet absent-minded nod and dabs her eyes with the handkercher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Estoy agradecida a la maestra Sauerback por este honor. No deseo morir en mi lecho. Prefiero caer en combate, defendiendo {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán y matando traidores». {n}Belinda asiente distraídamente pero con firmeza y se enjuga las lágrimas de los ojos con el pañuelo.{/n}

languages.text: 「ザウアーバック氏に感謝ですね。床で死にたくはありません。戦いの中でロード・キャプテンをお守りし、裏切り者どもを叩き潰して死なせてください」{n}ベリンダは鼻息荒く、しかしフワフワした様子でうなずき、ハンカチで目をぬぐう。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am grateful to Mistress Sauerback for the honour. I don't want to die in my bed. Let me fall in battle, defending the Lord Captain and crushing traitors." {n}Belinda gives an imperious yet absent-minded nod and dabs her eyes with the handkercher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ザウアーバック氏に感謝ですね。床で死にたくはありません。戦いの中でロード・キャプテンをお守りし、裏切り者どもを叩き潰して死なせてください」{n}ベリンダは鼻息荒く、しかしフワフワした様子でうなずき、ハンカチで目をぬぐう。{/n}

languages.text: “我很感激苏尔贝克女士赐予了我这样的殊荣，我不想死在病床上。让我战死沙场，消灭叛徒，保护舰长大人吧。”{n}贝琳达傲慢而漫不经心地点点头，用手帕擦了擦眼睛。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am grateful to Mistress Sauerback for the honour. I don't want to die in my bed. Let me fall in battle, defending the Lord Captain and crushing traitors." {n}Belinda gives an imperious yet absent-minded nod and dabs her eyes with the handkercher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我很感激苏尔贝克女士赐予了我这样的殊荣，我不想死在病床上。让我战死沙场，消灭叛徒，保护舰长大人吧。”{n}贝琳达傲慢而漫不经心地点点头，用手帕擦了擦眼睛。{/n}

languages.text: « Je suis reconnaissante à maîtresse Sauerback de m'avoir choisie. Je ne veux pas mourir dans mon lit. Permettez-moi de tomber au combat en défendant {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et en écrasant les traîtres. » {n}Belinda fait un signe de tête impérieux, mais distrait en se tamponnant les yeux avec son mouchoir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am grateful to Mistress Sauerback for the honour. I don't want to die in my bed. Let me fall in battle, defending the Lord Captain and crushing traitors." {n}Belinda gives an imperious yet absent-minded nod and dabs her eyes with the handkercher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je suis reconnaissante à maîtresse Sauerback de m'avoir choisie. Je ne veux pas mourir dans mon lit. Permettez-moi de tomber au combat en défendant {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et en écrasant les traîtres. » {n}Belinda fait un signe de tête impérieux, mais distrait en se tamponnant les yeux avec son mouchoir.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu onur için Sauerback Hanım'a minnettarım. Uykumda ölmek istemiyorum. Lord Kaptan'ı savaşta savunurken hainlerin başını ezerek ölmeme müsaade edin." {n}Belinda, hem otoriter hem de dalgın bir şekilde başını eğerek mendiliyle gözlerini siliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am grateful to Mistress Sauerback for the honour. I don't want to die in my bed. Let me fall in battle, defending the Lord Captain and crushing traitors." {n}Belinda gives an imperious yet absent-minded nod and dabs her eyes with the handkercher.{/n}
